description:
The new Dungeon Master’s Guide, due out in mid-November, will change how players craft magic items in Dungeons and Dragons. Wizards of the Coast spilled at least a moderate amount of beans about it, in an October 8 livestream on the magic items chapter of the updated book.

Continue reading Here’s how DnD’s 2024 DM Guide overhauls magic item crafting
MORE FROM WARGAMER: DnD 2024 Player's Handbook review,
title: Here’s how DnD’s 2024 DM Guide overhauls magic item crafting

description:
Games Workshop has released a new unit for its sci-fi skirmish game Necromunda that directly references a classic, and delightfully silly, Warhammer 40k design from the 1980s. The new Ironhead Squat Prospector Exo-kyn wear heavy exo-suits, which protect them from environmental hazards, wild beasts, and rival gangs. It's also a call back to a range of egg-shaped elite space dwarves released for the first edition of Warhammer 40k between 1989 and 1991.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k brings back egg-shaped space dwarves after 35 years
title: Warhammer 40k brings back egg-shaped space dwarves after 35 years

description:
Three new cards from the next Yugioh TCG release have been revealed by Japanese manga magazine V Jump. The cards are all new inclusions for the ‘Tenyi’ archetype, and while only their Japanese versions have been revealed thus far, translators have been hard at work on social media piecing together exactly what the cards do.

Continue reading Busted new Yugioh cards are coming to revive old deck that once topped the meta
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: Busted new Yugioh cards are coming to revive old deck that once topped the meta

description:
Games Workshop has released the mission pack for its upcoming Warhammer 40k Kill Team competition, ‘The Great Gun Fires’, which sees rival teams attempting to complete an operation before a mountain-sized mega cannon fires and devastates the kill zone with aftershocks. Five players who complete the custom mission and submit their results to GW before the end of October 14 will be in with a chance of winning every new Kill Team release until the end of 2025.

Continue reading Kill Team compet
title: Kill Team competition features what might be Warhammer 40k’s biggest gun ever

description:
If you’re trying to build up a collection of tabletop wargames terrain on a budget, we’ve found a great deal for you. North American craft store Michaels is selling a range of model building kits for just $4.99 each, and while they’re a lot cuter than anything that Games Workshop makes, they’re the perfect scale to make great terrain for Warhammer 40k or Age of Sigmar.

Continue reading Grab some cheap Warhammer 40k terrain in Michaels’ Halloween sale
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: Grab some cheap Warhammer 40k terrain in Michaels’ Halloween sale

description:
The Magic: The Gathering card Overlord of the Balemurk is spiking in price, and has quickly become one of Duskmourn’s most valuable cards, overtaking its pal in charge of the Hauntwoods, as well as big 9-mana boss demon Valgavoth.

Continue reading New MTG card that strengthens powerful deck spikes 325%
MORE FROM WARGAMER: All MTG sets in order, Upcoming MTG release dates<
title: New MTG card that strengthens powerful deck spikes 325%

description:
Oh dear, oh dear - Titus, what have they done to you? Lieutenant Demetrian Titus, protagonist of Warhammer 40k Space Marine 2, has been immortalized as an action figure for the second time, and somehow Macfarlane Toys has transformed his stern, august visage into a bloated, jowly mess.

Continue reading Warhammer 40k’s new Titus action figure is a crime against Space Marine jawlines
MORE FROM WARGAMER:
title: Warhammer 40k’s new Titus action figure is a crime against Space Marine jawlines
